result.execSummary:
The defendant Amanda Lee Dowler was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amanda Lee Dowler

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Case Called @ 10:03 AM: Defendant Amanda Lee Dowler in court with attorney Britteny Mae LaFond.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Joint agreement on resolution recited by ADA.  Def and counsel concur with State's recital.    Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea QN reviewed w/Defendant.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed.  Plea DC:  NC  Court accepts plea and enters JOC.  Statement by Def:  None offered.  The Court:  Accepts joint recommendation and Imposes Court Costs only - plus DNA surcharge.  DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.  Defendant advised of right to expunge DNA record through the Department of Justice.  Appeal Rights Given.

ADDRESS INFO for Amanda Lee Dowler
Current: 130 Northgate Ct, Wautoma, WI 54982 United States  (Effective: 11-10-2015)
Prior: 9011 Princess Rd, Lakeview, OH 43331

NOT PUT OF RECORD: Defendant Amanda Lee Dowler in court with attorney Britteny Mae LaFond, both appearing in person.  Scott C. Blader appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  P/S requested and scheduled.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 10, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Defendant's Response to State's Discovery Demand

The defendant must maintain absolute sobriety, may not be present upon the premises of any bars, and is prohibited from possessing/ingesting any impairing substances that have not been prescribed by a physician.    Complete booking process with the Sheriff's Department.

Case Called @ 1:13 PM: Defendant Amanda Lee Dowler in court with attorney Ben Szilagyi, both appearing via video.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Per SPD:  Eligibility confirmed.  ADA argues for $1000 Signature Bond w/conditions.  SPD concurs w/bond recommendation. SPD confirms that booking process has been completed.   NGP received and entered.   STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Status conference scheduled for October 13, 2015 at 09:20 am.
